address: Shahid Teymouri St, Ghasemi St, No. 68
aboutUs-content: Adtrace is an application and application analytics platform that acts as an interface between apps and advertisers. One of the most basic needs of apps and the app marketing department is to attribute users and categorize ad networks. This platform has been developed by Shaya Company, which has nearly 5 years of experience in developing software and big data and artificial intelligence services and Persian content, and tries to use its artificial intelligence and big data infrastructure to provide analytical products in the field of digital marketing and campaign management. Take advantage of advertising. Adtrace product has been produced and offered in this direction.
